name: DEITY SOULS Plus
description:
DEITY SOULS Plus is an 8-Bit adventure full of intense action, secret paths, and hidden secrets. Use your DEADING BLADE to cut through your enemies and surroundings.

JAEJAX is a Death Knight ruling over the Land of Utopia. A portal opens and a mysterious figure emerges to confront JAEJAX.

DEITY SOULS Plus Gameplay Features:


Run, jump, slash, duck, and roll through 6+ unique worlds unknown to JAEJAX.


Find and cast 6 POWERFUL SPELLS, such as WAVE CRUSH!

Locate, use, and upgrade 4 UNIQUE SUB WEAPONS! LUMBAR THE JACKS AXE, BROOD BLOODS SCYTHE, DANI DRAPOONS DRAGOON SPEAR, and MINE CRAFTERS HAMMER!

Discover ways to defeat the unique and varied enemies of JAEJAX .

Be cautious of the environment as it too can harm JAEJAX.

Find SECRET ITEMS, such as the RUIN RING! Gain NEW ABILITIES, such as BURNING BLOOD SLASH!

Defeat powerful DEITIES to add them to your harem of SUMMONS!


Summon and play as 6 UNIQUE DEITIES and 3 SECRET summons!




Purchase MYTHRYL ORE and other materials from the SHOPKEEPER.

Upgrade the DEADING BLADE and other weapons at the BLACKSMITH.

Uncover the lair of the WITCH to purchase her POWERFUL ARTIFACTS, such as the FEENIX PLUME!

DIVERSE WORLDS can be played in almost any order. Discover and traverse dangerous secret paths.


UPGRADE JAEJAX and his DEADING BLADE to have a balanced play through. OR UPGRADE a little for a challenge. OR DON’T UPGRADE at all and play the game in the HARDEST way possible!!! (squarePILLOWgames warns that you should not play like this, seriously it’s impossible… isn’t it?)

4 ARCADE MACHINES with mini games can be found and played, such as WING SWORD PENETRATION ZERO! Win FABULOUS prizes!



5 PETS are available to help JAEJAX in various unique ways. PIERCE-FLIES will attack enemies! A SECRET PET IS HIDDEN somewhere…


UNLOCK HATS and ACCESSORIES, such as the exquisite TOP HAT and MONACLE, by completing in-game achievements!


Seductive HEART attacks can be performed from certain enemies. These attacks will cause JAEJAX to be put into a SEDUCTION STATE!

Graphic 18+ Sexualized Full Screen Pixel Art Cutscenes



Defeating enemies yields a chance for a SPECIAL item to drop to unlock art in the art gallery.


Unlock Boss Rush

UNCOVER Secret power ups that require cursed garments to be worn!

DEITY SOULS Plus Is Rated 18+ (adult)
